answers.answer: Hi there,Lower back pain, numbness in legs and feet can be due to several conditions. Pressure on peripheral nerves from enlarged blood vessels, tumors, herniated disc, scar tissue, or infection, atherosclerosis, diabetes, transient ischemic attacks, vitamin B12 defficiency, insect bites, tick bites etc.IBS and panic attacks could be due to stress. You seem to be suffering from many physical ailments. Your physical health is upsetting your mental health and leading to multiple problems. Seek the opinion of an orthopaedician.You will need a thorough clinical check up and investigations like MRI spine. Moderate exercise and diet changes are necessary for controlling IBS and your other problems. Schedule an appointment soon. I hope it helps.Best luck and regards!

question: Always tired bags under eyes can't fall asleep at night and wake up tired. Body pain all over lower back pain migraines, legs and feet go numb when using bath room bad diet and no excercise.. Panic attacks and ibs. Always sick or dont feel good for at least 3/4 of the time What's wrong with me????
title: Need help? What's wrong with me???
